pageContent: Purpose: Diabetes mellitus is associated with a decreased risk of prostate cancer. However, previous studies examining the associations between diabetes mellitus and prostate cancer prognosis have produced mixed results. Here, we aim to summarize the effect of diabetes mellitus on prostate cancer prognosis.

metaData.source:
MR imaging and MR spectroscopic imaging of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15271371/
